title: Clean Water Act and the EPA

content.question: After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the foundation of the power that the EPA exercised related to the Clean Water Act, and explain how the EPA’s power can have an impact on civil liberties. Explain why a political appointee, such as the head of the EPA, might implement changes to the Clean Water Act differently than the civil servants who work within the EPA. Describe an informal power the president could use to influence the EPA’s policies regarding the Clean Water Act, and explain how the president’s statement might impact the actions of the EPA.
